items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, Stretchy, and Perfectly Weighted Quarter Zip Sweaters for Fall
items.body: I recently purchased these sweaters in rust, apricot-parchment, dusty deep blue, and army green, and I‚Äôm absolutely thrilled with them! I‚Äôm 5'6", 135 lbs, 34C, and went with a size medium, which fits perfectly‚Äîoversized and cozy without being too baggy. These sweaters are fantastic for dressing up or down, making them incredibly versatile for fall outfits. The rib knit material is soft, high-quality, and warm, with just the right amount of stretch for a comfortable fit that moves with you without losing its shape. The weight is perfect‚Äînot too heavy, but substantial enough to keep you cozy on chilly days. The quarter zip adds a stylish touch, and the zipper itself is sturdy and well-made, gliding smoothly without catching. The length is great, covering the bum, so they pair wonderfully with leggings, skinny jeans, or even baggy jeans for a relaxed, comfy look. The sleeve length is ideal, hitting right below my wrists. When I first took pictures of the army green sweater, it looked a bit wrinkled straight out of the package, but a quick pass with my steamer fixed it right up‚Äîno issues there. The colors are vibrant and true to the Amazon photos, with the rust and dusty deep blue being my personal favorites for that fall aesthetic. I‚Äôm really looking forward to wearing these as the weather cools down. The quality, stretch, and weight make these sweaters feel like a premium buy for the price, and they‚Äôre warm enough to keep me cozy on chilly days. If you‚Äôre after a stylish, versatile, stretchy, and perfectly weighted sweater that works for multiple looks and seasons, these are a fantastic choice. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: AMK

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality pullover
items.body: I bought two more of these after owning 3 that i bought a while ago. Great quality and they work well with jeans or leggings or even slightly dressier pants. I love all the color options. They are the perfect sweater type weight and so comfortable. I bought a large and they are true to size for me. I am 5'7" and weigh 166. Can't go wrong with these pullovers for the quality and value. Zipper works well and I usually wear a short sleeve type t-shirt underneath. Read more
items.author: Lori Gabram

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this pullover!
items.body: I wanted a red pullover to wear around the holidays. Well, I bought his one and like it so much that I bought many more in several colors. It is not a sweater and not a sweatshirt. It has a nice feel to it and looks nice for going to a restaurant or visiting people. It is 'oversized', but how much depends on what size you get. I always order clothing bigger than I should. The size above my size was way too big. So, I bought my actual size and it fit perfectly. It is very comfortable and still looks very nice on and not too 'oversized'. I would recommend it and if you order it and need a different size I had no problem with exchanging it. Read more
items.author: JMF

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars quality pull over
items.body: This pull over is more sweater than sweatshirt. Generously sized, cool texture with the ribbing, silver zipper and circle zipper toggle are attractive, long fitted cuffs on arms. I can see this being worn all 4 seasons. I washed in cold and dried flat to minimize shrinking and potential pilling and probably will continue to do so. The light blue is a very pretty, soft shade. I'm happy with this purchase and recommend this item. Read more
items.author: Honest review from CT

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely obsessed! ü§©
items.body: ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è OBSESSED! Perfect for the cold season! I am absolutely obsessed with this latest purchase! This Cruz Zip Red Sweatshirt is everything I wanted for the colder months ‚Äî cozy, comfortable, and surprisingly great quality. I‚Äôm wearing a size medium, and it does fit a little baggy, which I personally love for that relaxed, comfy look. Highly recommend! I think I might buy more other colors! Super excited! Read more
items.author: Brittany Frey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oversized Perfection ‚ú®
items.body: SO comfy, buttery soft, and perfectly oversized without looking boxy. The ribbed texture, silver zipper, and circle pull make it look way more expensive. Such a flattering, chic sweater! Read more
items.author: Nikki Sue

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs REALLY big, but is a wonderful sweater (I ordered 2 sizes down from my normal size)
items.body: I normally wear an XXL, but I ordered an XL. It was HUGE! I sent it back, and reordered it in a L. It was also really big, and still looked sloppy-big and wasn't particularly flattering on my body. I checked reviews again to see if/how this shrinks. Some reviewers said it shrinks fairly significantly. So, I took a chance and decided to keep the size L, but I washed (warm water because I wanted it to shrink) & dried it on medium this one time It did shrink significantly in circumference but not much in length. Now it fits me well, but doesn't look sloppy. I love this sweater. For future washings, due to comments about the fabric pilling, I will wash it in cold water in a mesh bag and will lay it flat to dry. Read more
items.author: Curly Mountain Girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great timeless top for 3 Seasons!
items.body: This top is stylish and comfortable. It washes well and it wears well. I love this color and the design is timeless. It's wonderful for Spring, Fall and Winter! This makes it a great purchase! I'm very happy with this top! Read more
items.author: Susanne Bernard

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Nutmeg, Grass Green, Dark Grey, Army Green, Black, Camel, Gray Coffee, Coffee - Burnt Brown, Cream - White, Gray, Rust, Brick - Orange Rust, Apricot - Parchment. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
